pr_title: Improve performance of HPACK static table lookup

timeline.bodyText: Optional idea: at index values above 15 have no other duplicate values.  I think it should be possible to break the loop here if the index is above 15
timeline.author: carl-mastrangelo

timeline.message:
Improve performance of HPACK static table lookup

Motivation:

HPACK static table is organized in a way that fields with the same
name are sequential. Which means when doing sequential scan we can
short-circuit scan on name mismatch.

Modifications:

* `HpackStaticTable.getIndexIndensitive` returns -1 on name mismatch
rather than keep scanning.
* `HpackStaticTable` statically defined max position in the array
where name duplication is possible (after the given index there's
no need to check for other fields with the same name)
* Benchmark for different lookup patterns

Result:

Better HPACK static table lookup performance.

timeline.bodyText: You either should use a BlackHole or let the methods return something. Otherwise these calls may be optimised away ... This is true for all methods here
timeline.author: normanmaurer

timeline.bodyText: use getBytes(Charset).... This is true for all lines above.
timeline.author: normanmaurer
